title: [100. Same Tree](https://leetcode.cn/problems/same-tree/)
content:
| English | 简体中文 |
100. Same Tree Description Given the roots of two binary trees p and q, write a function to check if they are the same or not.
Two binary trees are considered the same if they are structurally identical, and the nodes have the same value.
 
Example 1:
Input: p = [1,2,3], q = [1,2,3] Output: true Example 2:
Input: p = [1,2], q = [1,null,2] Output: false Example 3:
Input: p = [1,2,1], q = [1,1,2] Output: false  
Constraints:
The number of nodes in both trees is in the range [0, 100]. -104 <= Node.val <= 104 Related Topics Tree Depth-First Search Breadth-First Search Binary Tree Similar Questions
